## Overview

PaymentConfirmed component
Final confirmation screen shown after a successful checkout.

## Events

| Event           | Description                                  | Type                |
| --------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `returnToStore` | Emits an event to navigate back to the store | `CustomEvent<void>` |
